lyrics:
"Bigger Picture" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Bigger Picture" [Hook:] I'm about to make a motion picture, picture, picture, picture, picture, picture I wish that you could see the bigger picture, picture, picture, picture, picture, picture I'm just trying to get some money with you, with you, with you, with you, with you, with you I wish that you could see the bigger picture, picture, picture, picture, picture, picture It's Gucci man and I'm a motion picture [Verse 1:] Every Brick Squad production is a big budget production All this cash in my pocket, I'll make you handsome if you ugly She see me on the screen and she love to scream my name Had a sex tape with your wifey, I didn't even know her name I'm so icy niggas don't like me, I'm so iced out that a nigga wanna fight me Bitches be swearing I play for the Vikings Bitch I play for the south [?] If I like a Tina Turner I could beat her, beat her, beat em Raw paw to pay [?] keep good reefer Niggas bait you with a pitcher, trust you with a pitcher Trick you with a pitcher counterfeit you and remix you Niggas never play with Guwop, they see the bigger picture I put you on a tshirt then mail your mom a thank you card [Hook] [Verse 2:] Last night I heard someone shot a nigga Police going door to door showing my fucking picture Last week scrape girl on custody My aunt got nothin' but pictures and memories of her daughter Paint a picture with my words, I'm a fucking author Go get a mark up, five hundred thousand my marker Forever good, I learned to hustle from my uncle And I'm so hood, it's hard for me to get a sponsor Rap shit is long as the street, 14k all over my teeth Tattoos all over my face, saying I'm one single away How when I'm dealing the yay Fat boy, I'm eatin the K New rolls and forgis on a rari I'm ballin' like [?] [Hook] if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections Writer(s): Radric Davis, Chance Youngblood AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics album: "Trap House Four" (2014) Intro Already Top In The Trash Bet Money She Loves Money Drugs Like You Fuck Niggas Never Had Shit Standing In Line Bigger Picture Dope Love Nasty Spit In Yo Face Jugg House Bum Bum I'm So Numb How We Rockin Reminise Search
title: Bigger Picture Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
